eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.numerical

Class ExponentialSimilarity<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.numerical.ExponentialSimilarity<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - Type variable to represent the values involved in the similarity calculations (usually, double values).
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISimilarity<V>

    public class ExponentialSimilarity<V>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISimilarity<V>
    Implements numerical similarity measure based on an exponential decay function.
